## How to Access Our Data

### Public Access to Acoustic-Trawl Data:

**NOAA Coast Watch ERDDAP:**

[CPS Trawl Haul Catch Data](https://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/tabledap/FRDCPSTrawlLHHaulCatch.html)

[CPS Trawl Specimen Data](https://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/tabledap/FRDCPSTrawlLHSpecimen.html)

[NOAA Ship Reuben Lasker Underway Meteorological Data](https://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/tabledap/fsuNoaaShipWTEG.html)

**NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI):**

Locate raw acoustic data using the [NCEI Water Column Sonar Data Viewer](https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/maps/water-column-sonar/).

Download raw acoustic data via the viewer or the [AWS NCEI bucket](https://noaa-wcsd-pds.s3.amazonaws.com/index.html#data/raw/).

### Internal Access to Acoustic-Trawl Data:

Acoustic data is located on AST servers located at SWFSC and on the Google Cloud Platform. The following links are only available to AST program members at SWFSC.

AST Servers:

-   \\\\swc-storage4-s\\AST1

-   \\\\swc-storage4-s\\AST2

-   \\\\swc-storage3-s\\AST3

-   \\\\swc-storage4-s\\AST4

-   \\\\swc-storage4-s\\AST5

AST Google Cloud Buckets:

-   AST1 - Shimada Data: <https://console.cloud.google.com/storage/browser/ast1>

-   AST2 - Long Beach Carnage Data: <https://console.cloud.google.com/storage/browser/ast2>

-   AST3 - Lisa Marie Data: <https://console.cloud.google.com/storage/browser/ast3>
